  <a href="https://lms.curtin.edu.au/webapps/blackboard/content/listContentEditable.jsp?content_id=_14118598_1&course_id=_165323_1&mode=reset" style="display: block; padding: 12px 18px; color: #CBD5E1; font-size: 0.9rem; text-decoration: none;">About</a>
  </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Header -->
  <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0F172A 0%, #1E293B 100%); border-radius: 16px; padding: 32px; margin-bottom: 28px; text-align: center;">
    <div style="font-size: 48px; margin-bottom: 12px;">ğŸ’¡</div>
    <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', Consolas, monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 3px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 8px;">AI Skills Passport</div>
    <h1 style="font-family: 'Courier New', Consolas, monospace; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0 0 8px 0; letter-spacing: 1px;">KEY TAKEAWAYS</h1>
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #94A3B8; margin: 0; line-height: 1.5;">The big ideas, even if you do nothing else. Six principles worth knowing.</p>
  </div>

  <!-- Intro -->
  <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 24px;">
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #94A3B8; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0;">Short on time? Overwhelmed by AI? That's fine. If you take nothing else from the AI Skills Passport, take these six ideas. Each one comes with something you can try in two minutes.</p>
  </div>

  <!-- Takeaway 1: Conversation, Not Delegation -->
  <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <span style="font-size: 28px;">ğŸ’¬</span>
      <h2 style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0;">Conversation, Not Delegation</h2>
    </div>
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 12px 0;">Use AI as a thinking partner, not a vending machine. The value is in the back-and-forth â€” refining your ideas, challenging assumptions, iterating on drafts. The conversation <em>is</em> the work.</p>
    <div style="background: #0F172A; border-radius: 8px; padding: 14px 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #6366F1; letter-spacing: 1.5px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 6px;">Try this (2 min)</div>
      <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #94A3B8; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;">Next time you use AI, don't accept the first response. Reply with "What did you assume?" or "What's the weakest part of this?" and see how the output improves.</p>
    </div>
    <a href="https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749312_1/xid-91749312_1" target="_blank" style="font-size: 13px; color: #818CF8; text-decoration: none;">Go deeper: Working WITH AI â†’</a>
  </div>

  <!-- Takeaway 2: Model the Behaviour You Expect -->
  <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <span style="font-size: 28px;">ğŸª</span>
      <h2 style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0;">Model the Behaviour You Expect</h2>
    </div>
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 12px 0;">If you want students and colleagues to use AI thoughtfully, show them what that looks like. Share your process. Be transparent about when and how you used AI. Lead by example, not by policy alone.</p>
    <div style="background: #0F172A; border-radius: 8px; padding: 14px 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #6366F1; letter-spacing: 1.5px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 6px;">Try this (2 min)</div>
      <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #94A3B8; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;">Add a one-line note to your next document or email: "I used AI to help draft/check/summarise this." Notice how it changes the conversation.</p>
    </div>
    <a href="https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749316_1/xid-91749316_1" target="_blank" style="font-size: 13px; color: #818CF8; text-decoration: none;">Go deeper: What Would You Do? â†’</a>
  </div>

  <!-- Takeaway 3: Help Students Navigate These New Times -->
  <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <span style="font-size: 28px;">ğŸ§­</span>
      <h2 style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0;">Help Students Navigate These New Times</h2>
    </div>
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 12px 0;">Students need guidance, not prohibition. They're already using AI â€” the question is whether they're using it well. Meet them where they are and help them develop judgement, not just compliance.</p>
    <div style="background: #0F172A; border-radius: 8px; padding: 14px 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #6366F1; letter-spacing: 1.5px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 6px;">Try this (2 min)</div>
      <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #94A3B8; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;">Ask a student how they're using AI right now. Listen without judgement. You'll learn more in two minutes than from any report.</p>
    </div>
    <a href="https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749314_1/xid-91749314_1" target="_blank" style="font-size: 13px; color: #818CF8; text-decoration: none;">Go deeper: Rules of Engagement â†’</a>
  </div>

  <!-- Takeaway 4: Learning with AI Is Still Learning -->
  <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <span style="font-size: 28px;">ğŸ§ </span>
      <h2 style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0;">Learning with AI Is Still Learning</h2>
    </div>
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 12px 0;">It's different from how you learned, but the thinking still happens. When a student uses AI to explore, question, and refine their understanding, the conversation is the evidence of learning. The process matters more than the product.</p>
    <div style="background: #0F172A; border-radius: 8px; padding: 14px 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #6366F1; letter-spacing: 1.5px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 6px;">Try this (2 min)</div>
      <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #94A3B8; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;">Pick a topic you know well. Ask AI to explain it, then critique the response. Notice how evaluating AI output requires genuine understanding.</p>
    </div>
    <a href="https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749315_1/xid-91749315_1" target="_blank" style="font-size: 13px; color: #818CF8; text-decoration: none;">Go deeper: AI-Proof Your Assessments â†’</a>
  </div>

  <!-- Takeaway 5: AI Amplifies Thinking -->
  <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <span style="font-size: 28px;">ğŸ”Š</span>
      <h2 style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0;">AI Amplifies Thinking</h2>
    </div>
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 12px 0;">AI doesn't replace thinking â€” it amplifies it. Good input produces good output. Lazy input produces polished garbage. The quality of what you bring to the conversation determines the quality of what you get back.</p>
    <div style="background: #0F172A; border-radius: 8px; padding: 14px 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #6366F1; letter-spacing: 1.5px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 6px;">Try this (2 min)</div>
      <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #94A3B8; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;">Give AI a vague prompt, then rewrite it with specific context, audience, and purpose. Compare the two outputs. The difference is your thinking.</p>
    </div>
    <a href="https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749312_1/xid-91749312_1" target="_blank" style="font-size: 13px; color: #818CF8; text-decoration: none;">Go deeper: Working WITH AI â†’</a>
  </div>

  <!-- Takeaway 6: Keep a Human in the Loop -->
  <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 24px;">
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <span style="font-size: 28px;">ğŸ¤</span>
      <h2 style="font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0;">Keep a Human in the Loop</h2>
    </div>
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 12px 0;">AI makes mistakes. It hallucinates, oversimplifies, and misses context. Your judgement, domain expertise, and accountability are what make it work. You're not optional â€” you're essential.</p>
    <div style="background: #0F172A; border-radius: 8px; padding: 14px 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; color: #6366F1; letter-spacing: 1.5px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 6px;">Try this (2 min)</div>
      <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #94A3B8; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0;">Ask AI a factual question about your field. Fact-check one claim. You'll likely find something that's almost right but subtly wrong â€” that's why you matter.</p>
    </div>
    <a href="https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749313_1/xid-91749313_1" target="_blank" style="font-size: 13px; color: #818CF8; text-decoration: none;">Go deeper: Is This AI? â†’</a>
  </div>

  <!-- Footer: Want to explore further? -->
  <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0F172A 0%, #1E293B 100%); border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; text-align: center;">
    <h3 style="font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0 0 8px 0;">Want to explore further?</h3>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #94A3B8; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">These ideas come alive in the full experiences.</p>

    </div>
  </div>
